item.title: CVE-2023-45065|2024-09-12T18:24:19.562Z -- mad%20fish%20digital -- bulk%20noindex%20%26%20nofollow%20toolkit
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Mad Fish Digital Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit plugin <=Â 1.42 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29791|2024-08-02T01:17:57.569Z -- mad%20fish%20digital -- bulk%20noindex%20%26%20nofollow%20toolkit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mad Fish Digital Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Bulk NoIndex & NoFollow Toolkit: from n/a through 2.01.
